CustomField.formula: OR (AND( ParentAccount__c != null, ISPICKVAL( ChildType__c, "Combo")) ,AND (ParentAccount__c != null, ParentAccount__r.Federal_ID_Number__c != null, AccountId__r.Federal_ID_Number__c != null , ParentAccount__r.Federal_ID_Number__c = AccountId__r.Federal_ID_Number__c ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Is the relationship with its parent a Same FEIN/Combo relationship?
CustomField.label: Is Same FEIN?
